Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

Freeze ammunition carries chilling reagents that activate on contact with the target. A creature hit by activated freeze ammunition takes cold damage instead of the weapon's normal damage type, plus [[/r (2[splash])[cold]]] splash damage. Hitting a 5-foot-square surface successfully with freeze ammunition deals 2 cold splash damage and covers the space in a layer of ice. Each creature standing on the icy surface must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] save or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20] check or else fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. Creatures using an action to move onto the icy surface must attempt either a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance]. Creatures that Step or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Crawl] don't need to attempt a check or save. The ice melts after 1 minute, although unusually hot or cold temperatures can change this duration at the GM's discretion. Dealing at least 1 point of fire damage to the ice removes it instantly
